actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to dedicate the Chesapeake and Ohio Canal National Historical Park to Justice William O. Douglas in grateful recognition of his contributions to the people of the United States.

summary.text: Dedicates the canal and towpath of the Chesapeake and Ohio and National Historical Park to Justice William O. Douglas in recognition of his outstanding service as a conservationist and for his efforts to preserve and protect the canal and towpath. Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Interior to take such steps to appropriately inform the public of the contributions of Justice Douglas.

titles.title: A bill to dedicate the Chesapeake and Ohio Canal National Historical Park to Justice William O. Douglas in grateful recognition of his contributions to the people of the United States.
